name: Survive The Night (zlsinger)
description:
This game was made for Global Game Jam 2019.

Protect your home, and the ones important to you, from the ghouls who appear at night. Keep the lanterns around your home fueled with oil you find in the wilderness to ward off the attacking ghouls.

This game can be played with a keyboard, but is best experienced with a gamepad. It supports PS4, Xbox 360, and Xbox One controllers.

Controls (Keyboard / PS4 / Xbox):

Jump - Spacebar / X / A
Move - WASD / Left stick
Rotate Camera - Arrow keys / Right stick
Restart option - ESC / Options / Star

Credits:

Zachary Singer - Programmer
Brian Young - 3D Artist
Music by Platypus Patrol on the Unity Asset Store
Fire sound effect by Moonflower Carnivore on the Unity Asset Store
